title: 8 Bit Watch Face
summary: 8 Bit themed watch face. Background changes as the day progresses!
developerAddress: 112 Main St S Georgetown ON L7G3E4
description: First of it's kind available for Android wear. 8 Bit themed watch face. This app is available on any Android smart watch. Features:- Changing background based on time of day- Ambient mode for battery saving- Displays battery of wearable using 8 bit hearts- Customize the color of the Date, Hour and Minutes- Choose between 12 hour and 24 hour clock format- Select if you want to see the battery level and date in ambient modeHow to install:Some minutes after the app installed on your phone, the watch face will be copied to your watch automatically. If this does not happen, run 'Resync apps' from settings of the Android Wear App. Use the companion app to adjust according to your preferences the behaviour of the watchface. Please let us know if you run into any troubles.If you notice any bugs, please contact support@aliasapps.com and we will work on resolving it immediately.Thanks and enjoy!
descriptionHTML:
First of it's kind available for Android wear. 8 Bit themed watch face.
This app is available on any Android smart watch.

Features:
- Changing background based on time of day
- Ambient mode for battery saving
- Displays battery of wearable using 8 bit hearts
- Customize the color of the Date, Hour and Minutes
- Choose between 12 hour and 24 hour clock format
- Select if you want to see the battery level and date in ambient mode

How to install:
Some minutes after the app installed on your phone, the watch face will be copied to your watch automatically. If this does not happen, run 'Resync apps' from settings of the Android Wear App. Use the companion app to adjust according to your preferences the behaviour of the watchface. Please let us know if you run into any troubles.

If you notice any bugs, please contact support@aliasapps.com and we will work on resolving it immediately.

Thanks and enjoy!
comments: Nice graphics but background change isnt right The background changes, but it doesn't match the sunrise and sunset of the area you are in. Sunset was at 6pm, but background didn't switch to night until 9pm. A step counter display would be nice too
Simple and awesome, good work. Thanks for listening and providing 12 hour format! Looking forward to more updates
Fix the 24 Hours *Updated* I stand corrected. Thank you for the 12 hour format. It's now my favorite face.
Most amazing watch face It just needs a 12 hour format option but I'm still using it for the moment even though it takes me a minute longer to know the time in the afternoon
Watch face not centered I am using an LG G watch, and the time is not centered, cutting out part of the time. I love what it looks like, I just wish this would be fixed.
Really great but.... Love it and will be using it daily but it needs a 24/12 hour toggle.  An option to hide the hearts in ambient or at least make them black and white.
recentChanges: - Now supports both 12 hour and 24 hour clock formats
- Users can choose if they want the data or battery level displayed in ambient mode.
